div.pre: 2348 La Barrocca, 20 km. NW of Gerona, 1953 Burial: c. 80 B.C. (Guadan) Contents: 118 AR Emporiae: 42 dr. Iberian: 2 dr. ( Emporitan type) Roman Rep.: 74 den. Disposition: Gerona â€ Almagro Basch-Oliva Prat, NH 1960, pp. 145-69, illus. de Guadan, MPER, pp. 164-7 Crawford, RRCH 178
